entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
